current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., among its fiercest rival.

Press Release: Ken Loach , director of the film Looking For Eric Schmidt , stated: This raid is the action of a bully. Migrant workers are amongst the most vulnerable- poorly paid and far from home. Recent action by Unison to secure better wages and conditions at SOAS was good news. Now we wonder if the SOAS cleaners are being targeted because they dared to organise as trade unionists. We should all stand with them in solidarity in the face of this victimisation.
